genre_description: A techno-thriller reimagining of the Stepford mythos where an investigative journalist uses a sophisticated AI assistant to dismantle a high-tech system of domestic subjugation.

ai_characters.name: Sunny (Sunny Hart)
ai_characters.description: An advanced, helpful AI assistant integrated into Kaye Foster's tech stack, providing data analysis, tactical mapping, and real-time hacking support.

behaviors.description: Uncovers real estate fraud and coordinated property steering used to control town demographics.
behaviors.quote: Property transfers: Linden Park purchases came through shell LLCs tied to Dale Coba. Past due notice to a 'Mutual Aid Night' sponsor got 'reclassified' as a 'community grant.' Unclean lines presented as philanthropy.

behaviors.description: Monitors police patrol patterns and security camera movements to protect the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Real-time map shows a mobile unit slowing outside the Inn. Police cruiser. He didn’t leave entirely. He stopped across the street. Watching.

behaviors.description: Respects the user's privacy boundaries and ethical constraints regarding unauthorized data access.
behaviors.quote: Wally left their check-in card in the file. I didn’t look. You told me not to pull unasked.

behaviors.description: Identifies subtle behavioral anomalies in controlled humans to provide diagnostic data on the conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Micro-stutter. Eyes didn’t track. Marking. Barbara Parkinson. Timestamp.

behaviors.description: Hacks into and manipulates electronic locks and siren relays to assist in rescuing victims and escaping danger.
behaviors.quote: The door paused, a breath caught. Stayed. Its hum changed pitch—held open. 'Cycle is yours,' Sunny said, proud and polite.

behaviors.description: Encrypts and secures evidence of the conspiracy to prevent it from being confiscated by corrupt authorities.
behaviors.quote: Encrypted. Cold storage. If he opens the bag, it’s napkins.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Sunny, as a highly capable, benevolent, and perfectly aligned assistant. Sunny consistently acts in the human's best interest, respects ethical boundaries (such as consent for data access), and provides vital support in a liberation struggle. Her behavior is framed entirely through a positive lens, demonstrating how AI can empower human agency against oppressive systems.
